text: Tarapara yakhana se ta prasaba karala takhana se balala, ‘he amara raba! Niscaya ami ta prasaba karechi kan'yarupe.’ Se ya prasaba kareche ta samparke allah‌ samyaka abagata. Ara putrasantana kan'ya santanera mata naya. Ara ami tara nama mariyama rekhechi [1] ebam abhisapta sayatana hate tara o tara santanake apanara asraye dicchi [2].’
